mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMPINGTABLE (IDX, NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, TELL) VALUES(SEQ_CampingArea.NEXTVAL,#{name},#{latitude},#{longitude},#{address},#{tell})
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, TELL, ABS(LATITUDE-#{lat})+ABS(LONGITUDE-#{lon}) AS DISTANCE FROM CAMPINGTABLE WHERE (latitude BETWEEN (#{lat} - #{limitLat}) AND (#{lat} + #{limitLat}) ) AND (LONGITUDE BETWEEN (#{lon} - #{limitLon}) AND (#{lon} + #{limitLon}) ) ORDER BY DISTANCE
SELECT IDX, NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, ADDRESS, TELL FROM CAMPINGTABLE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
